Disk Management¶

Encrypted Disk¶

The current setup of Task Finder uses a veracrypt disk and mounts it as the system’s Default Workflow Directory.

Shares¶

The Shares page provides you a quick setup of the share permission of a folder from the Task Finder’s hosted server.

Note

If the share you created already exists on the server, you will have to remove the share manually from the server to override it.
